virtual-sensor.name: Dirruhorn_Dozer_WXT520Sup__conv
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerWxt520SupMsg) from Dirruhorn deployment converted

source.query: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, GENERATION_TIME, TIMESTAMP, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_NO, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1,cast(round(PAYLOAD_SU_TH / 10.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as HEATING_TEMPERATURE, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1,cast(round(PAYLOAD_SU_VH / 1000.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as HEATING_VOLTAGE, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1,cast(round(PAYLOAD_SU_VS / 1000.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as SUPPLY_VOLTAGE, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1,cast(round(PAYLOAD_SU_VR / 1000.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as REF_VOLTAGE from wrapper
